workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class OrdersRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Order>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.OrdersRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<Order>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/orders",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Order.class)
public class OrdersRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Order>

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/user")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Order\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteUserCreatedFor(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id)
        Just deletes the given User from Order's 'createdFor' property.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT in case of success.

      • deleteTask

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/tasks/{taskId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(\'Task\', \'delete\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteTask(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable(name="taskId")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long taskId)
        Deletes the Task itself from the DataBase.
        Parameters:
        id - Order.ID the given Task to be removed from.
        taskId - Task.ID to be removed.
        Returns:
        HttpStatus.NO_CONTENT if the Task is successfully removed.
